pages.text: $(li)The Slime Block is a sticky block that has special propierties.$(br)$(li)When any creature falls onto the top of a Slime Block bounces to height proportional to the falling velocity.

$(li)When being pushed by a Piston, entities that are ahead are launched into the direction the block is pushed into.$(br)$(li)When a Slime Block is pushed or pulled by a Piston, it attemps to move all adjacent blocks in the same as those that can be pulled by a Sticky Piston.$(br)$(li)Blocks that cannot be pulled by a sticky piston stay in place.$(br)$(li)There are exist multiple versions of the Slime Block.
$(li)The blocks that are moved may in turn push other blocks.$(br)$(li)Slime Blocks can be tinted with some dyes.
